ARD_TYPE_CHAR: Arduino Types - Character C type char
ARD_TYPE_TEXT: Arduino Types - Text C type String
ARD_TYPE_SHORT: Arduino Types - Short number C type char
ARD_TYPE_NUMBER: Arduino Types - Number C type integer
ARD_TYPE_LONG: Arduino Types - Large number C type long integer
ARD_TYPE_DECIMAL: Arduino Types - Decimal number C type floating point
ARD_TYPE_NULL: Arduino Types - Null C type void
ARD_TYPE_CHILDBLOCKMISSING: Arduino Types - Place holder value, indicates block with type not connected
ARD_ANALOGWRITE_TIP: tooltip - Write analog value between 0 and 255 to a specific PWM Port
ARD_DIGITALREAD_TIP: tooltip - Read digital value on a pin: HIGH or LOW
ARD_DIGITALWRITE_TIP: tooltip - Write digital value HIGH or LOW to a specific Port
ARD_BUILTIN_LED_TIP: tooltip - Light on or off for the built-in LED of the Arduino
ARD_TONE_PIN_TIP: tooltip - Generate audio tones on a pin
ARD_NOTONE_PIN_TIP: tooltip - Stop generating a tone on a pin
ARD_MAP_TIP: tooltip - Re-maps a number from [0-1024] to another.
ARD_FUN_RUN_TIP: tooltip - Defines the Arduino setup() and loop() functions.
ARD_PIN_WARN1: warning - Pin %1 is needed for %2 as pin %3. Already used as %4.
ARD_SERIAL_SETUP_TIP: tooltip - Selects the speed for a specific Serial peripheral
ARD_SERIAL_PRINT_TIP: tooltip - Prints data to the console/serial port as human-readable ASCII text.
ARD_SERIAL_PRINT_WARN: warning - A setup block for %1 must be added to the workspace to use this block!
ARD_SERVO_WRITE_TIP: tooltip - Set a Servo to an specified angle
ARD_SPI_TRANS_TIP: tooltip - Send a SPI message to an specified slave device.
ARD_SPI_TRANS_WARN1: warning - A setup block for %1 must be added to the workspace to use this block!
ARD_SPI_TRANS_WARN2: warning - Old pin value %1 is no longer available.
ARD_SPI_TRANSRETURN_TIP: tooltip - Send a SPI message to an specified slave device and get data back.
ARD_STEPPER_SETUP_TIP: tooltip - Configures a stepper motor pinout and other settings.
ARD_STEPPER_STEP_TIP: tooltip - Turns the stepper motor a specific number of steps
ARD_COMPONENT_WARN1: warning - A %1 configuration block with the same %2 name must be added to use this block!
ARD_TIME_DELAY_TIP: tooltip - Wait specific time in milliseconds
ARD_TIME_DELAY_MICRO_TIP: tooltip - Wait specific time in microseconds
ARD_TIME_MILLIS_TIP: tooltip - Returns the number of milliseconds since the Arduino board began running the current program. Has to be stored in a positive long integer
ARD_TIME_MICROS_TIP: tooltip - Returns the number of microseconds since the Arduino board began running the current program. Has to be stored in a positive long integer
ARD_TIME_INF_TIP: tooltip - Wait indefinitely, stopping the program.
ARD_VAR_AS_TIP: tooltip - Sets a value to a specific type
ARD_PULSE_READ: IO blocks - pulseIn - Block for function pulseIn(), it measure a pulse duration in a given pin.
ARD_PULSE_READ_TIMEOUT: IO blocks - pulseIn - Block similar to ARD_PULSE_READ, but it adds a time-out in microseconds.
ARD_PULSE_TIP: IO blocks - pulseIn - Tooltip for pulseIn() block.
ARD_PULSETIMEOUT_TIP: IO blocks - pulseIn - Tooltip for pulseIn() block when it uses the optional argument for time-out.
ARD_TONE_TIP: tooltip - Sets tone on pin to specified frequency within range 31 - 65535
ARD_TONE_WARNING: warning - Frequency must be in range 31 - 65535
ARD_NOTONE_TIP: tooltip - Turns the tone off on the selected pin
NEW_INSTANCE: Instances - Menu item to indicate that it will create a new instance
RENAME_INSTANCE: Instances - Menu item to rename an instance name
NEW_INSTANCE_TITLE: Instances - Menu item to create a new instance name and apply it to that block
RENAME_INSTANCE_TITLE: Instances - Confirmation message that a number of instances will be renamed to a new name
